Package com.bluenile.scrabble.dao

Class ScrabbleDaoText

java.lang.Object
com.bluenile.scrabble.dao.ScrabbleDaoText
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScrabbleDao
@Repository("text")
public class ScrabbleDaoText
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScrabbleDao
Class that implements ScrabbleDao interface to define its own data access, responsible to read the list of words from a text file and generate a List of ScrabbleWord objects. The @Repository annotation indicates that ScrabbleDaoText is a repository for encapsulating storage, retrieval and search behavior which creates a collection of scrabbleWords objects.
Version:
1.0 30 December 2020
Author:
Oswaldo_Gomez

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ScrabbleDaoText()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<ScrabbleWord> getWords​(java.lang.String inputWord)
    The implementation of this method opens the file system text file, reads the file line by line and stores the line in the readWord variable then creates an unqualified ScrabbleWord object and sets the word property to readWord and initializes the score property at zero if:
    readWord length is greater than zero and
    readWord length is less than or equal to inputWord length.
    If the List already exists then it is cleared.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ScrabbleDaoText

      public ScrabbleDaoText()

  • Method Details

    • getWords

      public java.util.List<ScrabbleWord> getWords​(java.lang.String inputWord)
      The implementation of this method opens the file system text file, reads the file line by line and stores the line in the readWord variable then creates an unqualified ScrabbleWord object and sets the word property to readWord and initializes the score property at zero if:
      readWord length is greater than zero and
      readWord length is less than or equal to inputWord length.
      If the List already exists then it is cleared.
      Finally closes the File and returns the ScrabbleWord objects List with the objects that accomplish the condition.
      Specified by:
      getWords in interface ScrabbleDao
      Parameters:
      inputWord - this parameter represents the input word provided by the client of the service and it will be used to filter the list of words from the data source based on its length.
      Returns:
      returns a list of model word objects based on the words read from the data source that are equal or less length to the input word length.
